page.title: 18Tourist attractions.
page.content: Tourists come mainly to Fiskerton although many enjoy walking the {footpaths}throughout the whole area. At Fiskerton, the main source of interest is the{River Trent.}Coarse {fishing}is the most popular sport and regular coach loads of people make day trips to the village. Many summer visitors also come to walk along the river bank and have picnics. At {Fiskerton Wharf,}there are mooring facilities for pleasure craft and barges can be hired for holidays. {Southwell Race Course,}Rolleston, is a major attraction and draws large crowds on race days. The race course is used as a camping and caravan site by tourists in summer on non race days. Fiskerton also has a small site with static caravans. {Oakdale Riding Centre}attracts people on its two or three open days a year.
